citation.article-title: Paramoritella alkaliphila gen. nov., sp. nov., a member of the family Moritellaceae isolated in the Republic of Palau.
citation.source: International Journal of Systematic and Evolutionary Microbiology

p.s: Emended description of the family Moritellaceae Ivanova et al. 2004
The description is as provided by Ivanova et al. (2004b), but with the following changes.
The family has 16S rRNA gene signature nucleotides consisting of G/A at position 399, C/T at position 858, G at position 1311 and C at position 1326.
The family comprises the type genus Moritella Urakawa et al. (1998) and the genus Paramoritella.
